001package gust.backend.model;
002
003import com.google.protobuf.Message;
004
005import javax.annotation.Nonnull;
006import javax.annotation.Nullable;
007
008
009/** Thrown when a model fails to write. Should be extended by more specific error cases. */
010@SuppressWarnings("unused")
011public class ModelWriteFailure extends PersistenceException {
012  /** Key for the model that failed to write. */
013  private final @Nullable Object key;
014
015  /** Model that failed to write. */
016  private final @Nonnull Message model;
017
018  /**
019   * Create a model write exception with a throwable as a cause.
020   *
021   * @param key Key for the record that failed to write.
022   * @param model Model that failed to write.
023   */
024  ModelWriteFailure(@Nullable Object key, @Nonnull Message model) {
025    super(String.format("Failed to write model at key '%s'.", key));
026    this.key = key;
027    this.model = model;
028  }
029
030  /**
031   * Create a model write exception with a throwable as a cause.
032   *
033   * @param key Key for the record that failed to write.
034   * @param model Model that failed to write.
035   * @param cause Cause for the error.
036   */
037  ModelWriteFailure(@Nullable Object key, @Nonnull Message model, @Nonnull Throwable cause) {
038    super(String.format("Failed to write model at key '%s': %s.", key, cause.getMessage()), cause);
039    this.key = key;
040    this.model = model;
041  }
042
043  /**
044   * Create a model write exception with a custom error message.
045   *
046   * @param key Key for the record that failed to write.
047   * @param model Model that failed to write.
048   * @param errorMessage Custom error message.
049   */
050  ModelWriteFailure(@Nullable Object key, @Nonnull Message model, @Nonnull String errorMessage) {
051    super(errorMessage);
052    this.key = key;
053    this.model = model;
054  }
055
056  /**
057   * Create a model write exception with a throwable and a custom error message.
058   *
059   * @param key Key for the record that failed to write.
060   * @param model Model that failed to write.
061   * @param cause Cause for the error.
062   * @param errorMessage Custom error message.
063   */
064  ModelWriteFailure(@Nullable Object key,
065                    @Nonnull Message model,
066                    @Nonnull Throwable cause,
067                    @Nonnull String errorMessage) {
068    super(errorMessage, cause);
069    this.key = key;
070    this.model = model;
071  }
072
073  // -- Getters -- //
074  /** @return Key for the model that failed to write. */
075  public @Nullable Object getKey() {
076    return key;
077  }
078
079  /** @return Model that failed to write. */
080  public @Nonnull Message getModel() {
081    return model;
082  }
083}
